passages.text:
You are on the bridge of the Enterprise. Data is at Ops, Geordi is flying the ship.

[[Go to the captain's ready room->Ready Room]]
[[Go to the dining room->Dining Room]]
[[Go to the training room->Training Room]]

links.name: Go to the captain's ready room

passages.name: Bridge

passages.text:
You are in the captain's ready room in the Enterprise. You may see the captain getting ready!

[[Go to the Bridge->Bridge]]
[[Go to the Dining Room->Dining Room]]
[[Go to the Training Room->Training Room]]
passages.name: Ready Room

passages.text:
You have entered the dining room where a feast is being held! Grab a seat and chow down on some amazing food.

[[Go to the Bridge->Bridge]]
[[Go to the captains Ready Room->Ready Room]]
[[Go to the Training Room->Training Room]]

links.name: Go to the captains Ready Room

passages.name: Dining Room

passages.text:
You have entered the training room! Grab a laser gun, some ammo, and suit up! Go test out your skills!

[[Go to the Bridge->Bridge]]
[[Go to the captain's Ready Room->Ready Room]]
[[Go to the Dining Room->Dining Room]]

links.name: Go to the captain's Ready Room

passages.name: Training Room
